attributes.action: return in full the deposits of the Landsbanki Guernsey bank depositors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Administrator of Landsbanki Guernsey bank has stated that the 2033 deposit accounts at the bank will receive a part-payment of 30p in the pound for their savings deposits. The remaining 70p in the pound that has yet to be realised is approximately 80 million pounds.

We demand that the money from Landsbanki Guernsey bank that was 'transferred' to Heritable bank be returned immediately as this money is from our deposits at Landsbanki Guernsey bank.

NOW IS THE TIME for the United Kingdom Government to ensure that the deposits of the Landsbanki Guernsey depositors are returned in full. This will help to restore confidence in its banking institutions.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
